```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Shiny
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(DT)

# Core
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)

# Database
library(odbc)
library(RSQLite)
```

```{r}
# Make data
set.seed(123)
sales_data_tbl <- tibble(
  date  = seq.Date(from = ymd("2018-01-01"), to = today(), length.out = 90),
  class = sample(c("marketing", "sales", "research"), size = 90, replace = TRUE),
  sales = runif(n = 90, min = 1, max = 100),
  class_input = str_to_title(class)
)
```




Sidebar {.sidebar}
------------------------

```{r}
# Inputs
checkboxGroupInput(
  inputId = "checkbox_group",
  label = h4("Checkbox Group"),
  choices = unique(sales_data_tbl$class_input),
  selected = unique(sales_data_tbl$class)
)

dateRangeInput(
  inputId = "date_range",
  label = h4("Date Range"),
  start = min(sales_data_tbl$date),
  end = max(sales_data_tbl$date),
  min = min(sales_data_tbl$date),
  max = max(sales_data_tbl$date)
)
```
